text: How to use and customize the icons on the shelf at the top of the main window.
The shelf gives you quick access to commonly used functions in Houdini.
Most tools create new nodes for you in the background.
Some items on the shelf and in the toolbox are more
– they do something immediately when you click them, and don’t enter into a
or show options on the operation controls toolbar.

Most tools will use the current selection if possible. Some tools will prompt you for one or more selections if the current selection is not relevant, or if it needs more information. For example, the
shelf tab prompts you to select the child and then the parent.
After you make a prompted selection, press
to finish the selection. (You can also press
Some tools have alternate action-like behavior when you hold
You can usually quick-place the object created by a tool at the origin by
-clicking the tool. For example, when you
, it immediately creates a sphere at the origin instead of asking you to place the sphere in the viewer.
-click the light or camera tools, they create a light/camera from the current view, instead of asking you to place the new object.
Hold the mouse over an item on the shelf to see its label and a brief description of what it does. While the tooltip is open, press
to see the full help page for the item.

body.name: sop_box
body.label: Box
summary: Creates a cube or six-sided rectangular box.

body.name: geometry_sphere
body.label: Sphere
summary: Creates a sphere or ovoid surface.

body.name: geometry_tube
body.label: Tube
summary: Creates open or closed tubes, cones, or pyramids.

body.name: sop_torus
body.label: Torus
summary: Creates a torus (doughnut) shaped surface.

body.name: sop_grid
body.label: Grid
summary: Creates planar geometry.

body.name: object_null
body.label: Null
summary:
Serves as a place-holder in the scene, usually for parenting. this object
does not render.

body.name: geometry_line
body.label: Line
summary: Creates polygon or NURBS lines from a position, direction, and distance.

body.name: geometry_circle
body.label: Circle
summary: Creates open or closed arcs, circles and ellipses.

body.name: geometry_drawcurve
body.label: Draw Curve
summary: Creates a curve based on user input in the viewport.

body.name: object_path
body.label: Path
summary: The Path object creates an oriented curve (path)

body.name: geometry_spraypaint
body.label: Spray Paint
summary: Spray paints random points onto a surface.

body.name: sop_font
body.label: Font
summary: Creates 3D text from Type 1, TrueType and OpenType fonts.

body.name: geometry_platonic
body.label: Platonic Solids
summary: Creates platonic solids of different types.

body.name: sop_lsystem
body.label: L-System
summary: Creates fractal geometry from the recursive application of simple rules.

body.name: sop_metaball
body.label: Metaball
summary: Creates metaballs and meta-superquadric surfaces.

body.name: geometry_file
body.label: File
summary: Reads, writes, or caches geometry on disk.

body.name: geometry_helix
body.label: Helix
summary: Creates spirals and helices.

body.name: object_combine
body.label: Combine
summary: Merges the geometry of multiple objects into the last selected one.

body.name: geometry_extract
body.label: Extract
summary: Creates a second object from a selected object or selected components.

body.name: geometry_mirror
body.label: Mirror
summary: Duplicates and mirrors geometry across a mirror plane.

body.name: geometry_copy
body.label: Copy to Points
summary: Copies geometry in the first input onto the points of the second input.

body.name: geometry_duplicate
body.label: Duplicate
summary: Copies geometry and applies transformations to the copies.

body.name: tool_align
body.label: Align Components
summary: Transforms an object, or inserts a Transform node in a geometry network, to align two faces on separate models.

body.name: object_matchtransform
body.label: Match Transform
summary: Transform objects to match another.

body.name: object_centerpivot
body.label: Move Pivot to Center
summary: Moves the pivot of an object to the center of the bounding box for that object.

body.name: object_movetopivot
body.label: Move Center to Pivot
summary: Moves an object’s bounding box center to its pivot.

body.name: object_freeze
body.label: Freeze
summary: Moves object level transforms into a Transform SOP at the geometry level.

body.name: object_bakeanimation
body.label: Bake Animation
summary: Bakes animation from object transforms and CHOP overrides.

body.name: generic_delete
body.label: Delete
summary:
Deletes input geometry by group, entity number, bounding volume,
primitive/point/edge normals, and/or degeneracy.

body.name: generic_hide
body.label: Hide
summary: Turns off the display flag for the selected object node.

body.name: object_parent
body.label: Parent
summary: Makes the selected object’s transforms relative to a parent object.

body.name: sop_skin
body.label: Skin
summary: Builds a skin surface between any number of shape curves.

body.name: sop_rails
body.label: Rails
summary:
Generates surfaces by stretching cross-sections between
two guide rails.

body.name: sop_sweep::2.0
body.label: Sweep
summary: Creates a surface by sweeping a cross section curve along a spine curve.

body.name: sop_creep
body.label: Creep
summary: Deforms and animates a piece of geometry across a surface.

body.name: sop_ray
body.label: Ray
summary: Projects one surface onto another.

body.name: sop_boolean::2.0
body.label: Boolean
summary: Combines two polygonal objects with boolean operators, or finds the intersection lines between two polygonal objects.

body.name: geometry_voronoifracture
body.label: Shatter
summary: Shatters the input geometry into multiple pieces.

body.name: sop_topobuild
body.label: TopoBuild
summary: Lets you interactively draw a reduced quad mesh automatically snapped to existing geometry.

body.name: sop_carve
body.label: Carve
summary:
Slices, cuts or extracts points or cross-sections from a
primitive.

body.name: sop_convert
body.label: Convert
summary: Converts geometry from one geometry type to another.

body.name: sop_refine
body.label: Refine
summary:
Increases the number of points/CVs in a curve or surface
without changing its shape.

body.name: sop_reverse
body.label: Reverse
summary: Reverses or cycles the vertex order of faces.

body.name: sop_sculpt
body.label: Sculpt
summary: Lets you interactively reshape a surface by brushing.

body.name: sop_scatter::2.0
body.label: Scatter
summary: Scatters new points randomly across a surface or through a volume.

body.name: geo_group
body.label: Group
summary: Generates groups of points, primitives, edges, or vertices according to various criteria.

body.name: sop_edit
body.label: Edit
summary: Edits points, edges, or faces interactively.

body.name: sop_visibility
body.label: Visibility
summary: Shows/hides primitives in the 3D viewer and UV editor.

body.name: sop_topobuild
body.label: TopoBuild
summary: Lets you interactively draw a reduced quad mesh automatically snapped to existing geometry.

body.name: sop_polyextrude::2.0
body.label: PolyExtrude
summary: Extrudes polygonal faces and edges.

body.name: sop_polybevel::3.0
body.label: PolyBevel
summary: Creates straight, rounded, or custom fillets along edges and corners.

body.name: sop_polybridge
body.label: PolyBridge
summary: Creates flat or tube-shaped polygon surfaces between source and destination edge loops, with controls for the shape of the bridge.

body.name: sop_polysplit::2.0
body.label: PolySplit
summary: Divides an existing polygon into multiple new polygons.

body.name: sop_edgeloop
body.label: Edge Loop
summary: Creates a loop of cuts using polysplit.

body.name: sop_polyreduce::2.0
body.label: PolyReduce
summary: Reduces the number of polygons in a model while retaining its shape. This node preserves features, attributes, textures, and quads during reduction.

body.name: sop_polyfill
body.label: PolyFill
summary: Fills holes with polygonal patches.

body.name: sop_polyexpand2d
body.label: PolyExpand2D
summary: Creates offset polygonal geometry for planar polygonal graphs.

body.name: sop_edgecollapse
body.label: Edge Collapse
summary: Collapses edges and faces to their centerpoints.

body.name: sop_edgecusp
body.label: Edge Cusp
summary:
Sharpens edges by uniquing their points and recomputing point
normals.

body.name: sop_edgeflip
body.label: Edge Flip
summary: Flips the direction of polygon edges.

body.name: sop_edgedivide
body.label: Edge Divide
summary: Inserts points on the edges of polygons and optionally connects them.

body.name: sop_dissolve::2.0
body.label: Dissolve
summary:
Removes edges from the input polygonal geometry merging polygons with
shared edges.

body.name: sop_knife
body.label: Knife
summary: Divides, deletes, or groups geometry based on an interactively drawn line.

body.name: sop_clip
body.label: Clip
summary:
Removes or groups geometry on one side of a plane,
or creases geometry along a plane.

body.name: sop_subdivide
body.label: Subdivide
summary: Subdivides polygons into smoother, higher-resolution polygons.

body.name: sop_facet
body.label: Facet
summary: Controls the smoothness of faceting of a surface.

body.name: sop_smooth::2.0
body.label: Smooth
summary: Smooths out (or
) polygons, meshes and curves without increasing the number of points.

body.name: geometry_curvefromedges
body.label: Curve from Edges
summary: Converts the input geometry into line segments.

body.name: sop_bulge
body.label: Bulge
summary:
Deforms the points in the first input using one or more magnets
from the second input.

body.name: sop_lattice
body.label: Lattice
summary: Deforms geometry based on how you reshape control geometry.

body.name: sop_fractal
body.label: Fractal
summary:
Creates jagged mountain-like divisions of the input
geometry.

body.name: geometry_mountain
body.label: Mountain
summary: Adds or generates noise in geometry attributes.

body.name: geometry_waves
body.label: Waves
summary: Creates an ocean like surface.

body.name: sop_ripple::2.0
body.label: Ripple
summary:
Generates ripples by displacing points along the up direction
specified.

body.name: object_morph
body.label: Morph
summary: Computes a 3D metamorphosis between shapes with the same topology.

body.name: sop_uvproject
body.label: UV Project
summary:
Assigns UVs by projecting them onto the surface from
a set direction.

body.name: sop_uvedit
body.label: UV Edit
summary: Lets you interactively move UVs in the texture view.

body.name: sop_uvbrush
body.label: UV Brush
summary: Adjusts texture coordinates in the UV viewport by painting.

body.name: sop_uvfuse
body.label: UV Fuse
summary: Merges UVs.

body.name: sop_uvflatten::3.0
body.label: UV Flatten
summary: Creates flattened pieces in texture space from 3D geometry.

body.name: sop_uvpelt::2.0
body.label: UV Pelt
summary: Relaxes UVs by pulling them out toward the edges of the texture area.

body.name: sop_texture
body.label: UV Texture
summary:
Assigns texture UV coordinates to geometry
for use in texture and bump mapping.

body.name: sop_uvtransform::2.0
body.label: UV Transform
summary: Transforms UV texture coordinates on the source geometry.

body.name: sop_uvunwrap
body.label: UV Unwrap
summary: Separates UVs into reasonably flat, non-overlapping groups.

body.name: sop_uvquickshade
body.label: UV Quick Shade
summary: Applies an image file as a textured shader to a surface.

body.name: generic_cleartexcache
body.label: Clear Texture Cache
summary: Clears the texture cache, forcing textures to be reloaded.

body.name: sop_uvsmooth
body.label: UV Smooth
summary: Smooths out (or
) polygons, meshes and curves without increasing the number of points.

body.name: object_bones
body.label: Bones
summary: Allows you to interactively draw and manipulate bone chains before animating.

body.name: object_bonesfromcurve
body.label: Bones from Curve
summary: Allows you to create a bone chain along a curve.

body.name: object_pose
body.label: Pose
summary: Pose characters by manipulating control objects.

body.name: rigging_ikfromobjects
body.label: IK from Objects
summary: Allows you to build an IK bone rig (with or without a Twist Affector) from existing objects in the scene.

body.name: rigging_ikfrombones
body.label: IK from Bones
summary: Allows you to build an IK bone rig (with or without a Twist Affector) from existing bone(s) in the scene.

body.name: object_capturegeometry
body.label: Capture Geometry
summary: Uses one or more geometry objects as the skin for a hierarchy of bones or a set of metaball objects.

body.name: object_editcaptureregion
body.label: Edit Capture Regions
summary: Allows you to adjust the bone capture regions.

body.name: object_editcaptureweight
body.label: Edit Capture Weights
summary: Individually modifies point capture weights using slider handles on bones or via a spreadsheet.

body.name: object_editcaptureblend
body.label: Edit Capture Blends
summary: Allows you to adjust the blending of previously captured geometry in the Object Viewer.

body.name: object_mirrorcapture
body.label: Mirror Capture Weights
summary: Applies capture weights from one side of a geometry object to another.

body.name: object_paintcapturelayer
body.label: Paint Capture Layer
summary: Lets you paint capture attributes directly onto geometry.

body.name: object_aligncapturepose
body.label: Align Capture Pose
summary: Match transforms on capture regions between the current animation and capture poses.

body.name: sop_deltamush
body.label: Delta Mush
summary: Smooths out (or
) point deformations.

body.name: sop_comb
body.label: Comb
summary: Adjust surface point normals by painting.

body.name: object_posespacedeform
body.label: Pose-Space Deform
summary: Interpolates between a set of pose-shapes based on the value of a set of drivers.

body.name: object_autorigs
body.label: Autorigs
summary: Creates a
that will allow you to create animation rigs for your characters.

body.name: object_simplebiped
body.label: Simple Biped
summary: A simple and efficient animation rig with full controls.

body.name: object_simplefemale
body.label: Simple Female
summary: A simple and efficient female character animation rig with full controls.

body.name: object_simplemale
body.label: Simple Male
summary: A simple and efficient male character animation rig with full controls.

body.name: object_mocapbiped1
body.label: Mocap Biped 1
summary: A male character with motion captured animations.

body.name: object_mocapbiped2
body.label: Mocap Biped 2
summary: A male character with motion captured animations.

body.name: object_mocapbiped3
body.label: Mocap Biped 3
summary: A male character with motion captured animations.

body.name: object_mocapbiped3
body.label: Mocap Biped 3
summary: A male character with motion captured animations.

body.name: object_constraintparentblend
body.label: Parent Blend
summary: Blends between parent objects.

body.name: object_constraintblend
body.label: Blend
summary: Blends the positions and orientations of the current object transform with target objects.

body.name: object_constraintlookat
body.label: Look At
summary: Makes an object point at another object.

body.name: object_constraintpath
body.label: Follow Path
summary: Animates an object along a curve.

body.name: object_constraintpoints
body.label: Points
summary: Constrains to points on geometry or point cloud.

body.name: object_constraintsurface
body.label: Surface
summary: Constrain to an exact point on the surface of geometry.

body.name: object_constrainttransform
body.label: Transform Constraint
summary: Apply a transform as a constraint with an optional pivot.

body.name: object_blendpose
body.label: BlendPose
summary: Allows you to create a series of relationships between several objects, where target objects will react to driver objects.

body.name: object_lagobject
body.label: Lag
summary: Makes one object lag behind another object.

body.name: object_jiggleobject
body.label: Jiggle
summary: Jiggles the position of an object based on the animation of another object.

body.name: object_constraintgamepad
body.label: Gamepad
summary: Drive an object using a game controller device.

body.name: object_constrainttoggle
body.label: Toggle Constraint
summary: Toggles Constraints on selected objects.

body.name: object_constraintbake
body.label: Bake Constraint
summary: Bake Constraints on selected objects.

body.name: object_constraintdelete
body.label: Delete Constraint
summary: Delete Constraints on selected objects.

body.name: object_groom_addfur
body.label: Add Fur
summary: Adds fur to a surface.

body.name: object_groom_guidegroomempty
body.label: Create Empty Guide Groom
summary: Creates a container object for guide curves.

body.name: object_groom_guidegroom
body.label: Create Guides
summary: Creates a guide curves from a skin geometry or manipulates the guides of another groom object.

body.name: object_groom_groommerge
body.label: Merge Groom Objects
summary: Combines the guides and skin of multiple groom objects.

body.name: object_groom_animateguides
body.label: Deform Guides
summary: Creates a Guide Deform object in the network.

body.name: object_groom_simguides
body.label: Simulate Guides
summary: Adds physics simulation to a set of guides.

body.name: object_groom_hairgen
body.label: Generate Hair
summary: Generates hair based on a groom node object’s output.

body.name: object_groom_isolateparts
body.label: Isolate Groom Parts
summary: Hide and disable unselected parts of a groom for faster feedback.

body.name: object_groom_togglehairdisplay
body.label: Toggle Display
summary: Turns the display flag of the Hair Generate object on and off.

body.name: object_groom_haircardgen
body.label: Generate Hair Cards
summary: Converts dense hair curves to a polygon card, keeping the style and shape of the groom.

body.name: object_groom_haircardtexture
body.label: Hair Card Texture
summary: Creates textures to be applied to existing hair cards.

body.name: sop_groom_guideinit
body.label: Initialize Guides
summary: Gives the guides an initial direction.

body.name: sop_groom_curveadvect
body.label: Curve Advect
summary: Advects curves using a vector field generated from curves drawn on the skin surface.

body.name: object_groom
body.label: Groom
summary: Creates a Guide Groom SOP ready to draw & brush curves.

body.name: sop_groom_reguide
body.label: Reguide
summary: Interpolates guides between planted guides.

body.name: sop_groom_guideprocess_setdir
body.label: Set Guide Direction
summary: Points guides in the direction of a vector.

body.name: sop_groom_guideprocess_length
body.label: Set Guide Length
summary: Lengthens or shortens guide hairs.

body.name: sop_groom_guideprocess_lift
body.label: Lift Guides
summary: Lifts curves off the skin or flattens them against it.

body.name: sop_groom_guideprocess_straighten
body.label: Straighten Guides
summary: Straightens the hair by bending each segment back so that it’s in the same direction as the previous segment.

body.name: sop_groom_guideprocess_smooth
body.label: Smooth Guides
summary: Blends the shapes of the neighboring guides to create a smoother look.

body.name: sop_groom_guideprocess_frizz
body.label: Frizz Guides
summary: Offsets the curve points along the guide hairs to create a frizzy look.

body.name: sop_groom_guideprocess_bend
body.label: Bend Guides
summary: Bends curves in a certain direction and by a certain angle.

body.name: sop_groom_hairclump
body.label: Clump Guides
summary: Creates bunches of guide hairs.

body.name: sop_groom_drawpartingline
body.label: Part Guides
summary: Lets you draw a parting line on the skin geometry.

body.name: sop_groom_whitehair
body.label: Add White Hairs
summary: Adds the required attribute to mark hairs as white hairs in the standard hair shader.

body.name: terrain_hills
body.label: Terrain: Hills
summary: Sets up a preset height field network to generate hilly terrain. This is useful for learning how the terrain tools work together.

body.name: terrain_mountain
body.label: Terrain: Mountain
summary: Sets up a preset height field network to generate a mountain terrain. This is useful for learning how the terrain tools work together.

body.name: terrain_valley
body.label: Terrain: Valley
summary: Sets up a preset height field network to generate valley terrain. This is useful for learning how the terrain tools work together.

body.name: terrain_moonscape
body.label: Terrain: Moonscape
summary: Sets up a preset height field network to generate lunar terrain. This is useful for learning how the terrain tools work together.

body.name: terrain_islands
body.label: Terrain: Islands
summary: Sets up a preset height field network to generate island terrain. This is useful for learning how the terrain tools work together.

body.name: terrain_canyon
body.label: Terrain: Canyon
summary: Sets up a preset height field network to generate deep canyon terrain. This is useful for learning how the terrain tools work together.

body.name: terrain_dunes
body.label: Terrain: Dunes
summary: Sets up a preset height field network to generate desert dune terrain. This is useful for learning how the terrain tools work together.

body.name: geometry_vellumsimplecloth
body.label: Simple Cloth
summary: Configures SOP-based vellum cloth from geometry and collider.

body.name: geometry_vellumsimplesoftbody
body.label: Simple Softbody
summary: Configures SOP-based vellum softbody from geometry and collider.

body.name: geometry_rbdsimplefracture
body.label: Simple Fracture
summary: Fractures the input geometry based on a material type.

body.name: geometry_rbdsimpleguided
body.label: Simple Guided RBDs
summary: Configures SOP-based bullet RBD fractured objects from geometry, collider, and guide geometry.

body.name: geometry_muzzleflash
body.label: Simple Muzzle Flash
summary: Creates a visible blast from the the muzzle of a firearm during shooting.

body.name: geometry_pyrosimplebillowysmoke
body.label: Simple Billowy Smoke
summary: Creates thick cloud-like smoke rising from a spherical base.

body.name: geometry_spyro_gpuburst
body.label: Simple GPU Ground Explosion
summary: Creates an explosion that can be fully simulated on the GPU.

body.name: geometry_spyro_gputorch
body.label: Simple GPU Torch
summary: Creates a torch fire that can be fully simulated on the GPU.

body.name: geometry_pyrosimplefireball
body.label: Simple Fireball
summary: Creates a large rising and expanding explosion.

body.name: geometry_spyro_airexplosion
body.label: Simple Aerial Explosion
summary: Creates an aerial explosion.

body.name: geometry_spyro_groundexplosion
body.label: Simple Ground Explosion
summary: Creates a large ground explosion.

body.name: geometry_spyro_shockwave
body.label: Simple Shockwave
summary: Creates a large rising and expanding explosion with a ground shockwave.

body.name: geometry_spyro_campfire
body.label: Simple Bonfire
summary: Creates a bonfire simulation using the sparse pyro solver.

body.name: geometry_pyrosimplefirespread
body.label: Simple Spreading Fire
summary: Creates a fire simulation spreading across the surface of the selected object.

body.name: cloud_create
body.label: Cloud Rig
summary: Converts geometry into a cloud, complete with lighting.

body.name: cloud_light
body.label: Cloud Light
summary: Fills a volume with a diffuse light.

body.name: sky_rig
body.label: Sky Rig
summary: Creates a sky filled with volumentric clouds

body.name: geometry_fogvolume
body.label: Volume
summary: Builds an offset surface from geometry.

body.name: geometry_vdbfrompolygons
body.label: SDF Polys
summary: Converts polygonal surfaces and/or surface attributes into VDB volume primitives.

body.name: geometry_vdbfromparticles
body.label: SDF Particles
summary: Converts point clouds and/or point attributes into VDB volume primitives.

body.name: geometry_paintcolorvolume
body.label: Volume Paint Color
summary: Creates a color volume based on drawn curve

body.name: geometry_paintfogvolume
body.label: Volume Paint Fog
summary: Creates a fog volume based on drawn curve

body.name: geometry_paintsdfvolume
body.label: Volume Paint SDF
summary: Creates an SDF volume based on drawn curve

body.name: geometry_volumerasterizepoints
body.label: Fog Points
summary: Converts a point cloud into a volume.

body.name: geometry_volumerasterizeparticles
body.label: Fog Particles
summary: Converts a point cloud into a volume.

body.name: geometry_volumerasterizecurve
body.label: Fog Curve
summary: Converts a curve into a volume.

body.name: geometry_convertvdb
body.label: Convert VDB
summary: Converts sparse volumes.

body.name: object_cam
body.label: Camera
summary: You can view your scene through a camera, and render from its point of view.

body.name: object_distantlight
body.label: Distant Light
summary: Creates or edits a USD Distant Light, representing a far-off light source such as the sun. Adds some useful Karma-specific attributes.

body.name: object_envlight
body.label: Environment Light
summary: Environment Lights provide background illumination from outside the scene.

body.name: object_ambient
body.label: Ambient Light
summary: Adds a constant level of light to every surface in the scene (or in the light’s mask), coming from no specific direction.

body.name: object_stereocamrig
body.label: Stereo Camera
summary: Provides parameters to manipulate the interaxial lens distance as well as the zero parallax setting plane in the scene.

body.name: object_vrcam
body.label: VR Camera
summary: Camera supporting VR image rendering.

body.name: object_switcher
body.label: Switcher
summary: Acts as a camera but switches between the views from other cameras.

body.name: obj_gamepadcamera
body.label: Gamepad Camera
summary: Drive a camera using a game controller device in first person perspective.

body.name: dynamics_staticobject
body.label: Static Object
summary: Creates a Static Object from SOP Geometry.

body.name: dop_deformingobject
body.label: Deforming Object
summary: Creates a DOPs collision object from deforming SOP Geometry.

body.name: dop_surfacecollider
body.label: Surface Collider
summary: Create a Static Object from SOP Geometry pre-configured for interaction with cloth.

body.name: dop_groundplane
body.label: Ground Plane
summary: Creates an infinite ground plane suitable for RBD, cloth, or wire simulations.

body.name: dynamics_popfireworks
body.label: Fireworks
summary: Emits multi-colored particles from a point, which simulates fireworks.

body.name: dynamics_poplocation
body.label: Location Particle Emitter
summary: Emits particles from a point in all directions.

body.name: dynamics_popsource
body.label: Source Particle Emitter
summary: Emits particles from an object in all directions.

body.name: dynamics_popreplicate
body.label: Replicate Particles
summary: Generates particles from incoming particles.

body.name: dynamics_popaxisforce
body.label: Axis Force Particles
summary: Calculates and applies a force around an axis.

body.name: dynamics_popattracttopoints
body.label: Point Attract Particles
summary: Attracts particles to points or curves.

body.name: dynamics_popattracttocurvepoint
body.label: Curve Attract Particles
summary: Attracts particles to points or curves.

body.name: dynamics_popcurveforce
body.label: Curve Force Particles
summary: Creates forces generated from a curve.

body.name: dynamics_popmetaballforce
body.label: Metaball Force Particles
summary: Applies forces according to metaballs.

body.name: dynamics_popcolor
body.label: Color Particles
summary: Changes a particle’s diffuse color and/or alpha.

body.name: dynamics_popdrag
body.label: Drag Particles
summary: Applies drag particles.

body.name: dynamics_popfan
body.label: Fan Particles
summary: Applies a conical fan wind to particles.

body.name: dynamics_popflock
body.label: Flock Particles
summary: Applies a flocking algorithm to particles.

body.name: dynamics_popforce
body.label: Force Particles
summary: Applies a directional force to particles.

body.name: dynamics_popwind
body.label: Wind on Particles
summary: Applies wind to particles.

body.name: dynamics_popinteract
body.label: Interact Particles
summary: Applies forces between particles.

body.name: dynamics_popcollision
body.label: Collision Detect Particles
summary: Detects and reacts to collisions.

body.name: dynamics_popinstance
body.label: Instance Geometry on Particles
summary: Lets you instance geometry on particles.

body.name: dynamics_popsprite
body.label: Sprite Particles
summary: Sets the sprite display for particles.

body.name: dynamics_popvortexfilaments
body.label: Vortex Filaments
summary: Swirls particles based on the simulated drift of
represented by polylines.

body.name: dynamics_popgrains
body.label: Dry Sand
summary: Creates a grain object from a piece of geometry.

body.name: dynamics_popgrainswet
body.label: Wet Sand
summary: Creates a grain object from a piece of geometry, with a clumpy wet look.

body.name: dynamics_sandbox
body.label: Sand Box
summary: Creates a patch of sand with a collision object which contains the sand.

body.name: dynamics_rbdgrains
body.label: RBD Grains
summary: Fills an object with spheres and uses the Bullet solver to drive them.

body.name: geometry_grainupres
body.label: Upres Sand
summary: Takes each particle from your original simulation and replaces it with a cluster of new ones.

body.name: dynamics_popgrainsolid
body.label: Granular Solid
summary: Fills an object loosely with grains and creates constraints to hold it together into one object.

body.name: dynamics_popgrainsheet
body.label: Granular Sheet
summary: Fills the surface of an object with densely packed grains and makes constraints to hold them together.

body.name: dynamics_popgrainstrand
body.label: Granular Strand
summary: Fills grains along the edges of polygons, creating a beaded wire effect.

body.name: dynamics_popautofreeze
body.label: Auto-Sleep Particles
summary: Allows grains to wake up and go to sleep based on the velocity of nearby particles.

body.name: dynamics_popawaken
body.label: Awaken By Geometry
summary: Activates particles near animated geometry.

body.name: dynamics_slicebyplane
body.label: Slice
summary: Slices a particle fluid across an arbitrary plane for distribution to a simulation farm.

body.name: dynamics_slicealongline
body.label: Slice Along Line
summary: Slices a particle fluid using a set number of slicing planes evenly spaced along a certain direction.

body.name: dynamics_distribute_fluid
body.label: Distribute Particle Fluid
summary: Distribute shelf tools set up an object’s sim network so it can be solved in parallel on a farm of multiple machines using HQueue.

body.name: dop_surfacecollider
body.label: Surface Collider
summary: Create a Static Object from SOP Geometry pre-configured for interaction with cloth.

body.name: dynamics_vellumcloth
body.label: Vellum Cloth
summary: Configures vellum cloth from geometry and adds to current vellum simulation.

body.name: dynamics_vellumhair
body.label: Vellum Hair
summary: Configures vellum hair from geometry and adds to current vellum simulation.

body.name: dynamics_vellumsoftbody
body.label: Vellum Strut Softbody
summary: Configures Vellum strut softbody from geometry and adds to current Vellum simulation.

body.name: dynamics_vellumtetsoftbody
body.label: Vellum Tetrahedral Softbody
summary: Tetrahedralizes input geometry, configures it as a Vellum softbody, and adds it to current Vellum simulation.

body.name: dynamics_vellumballoon
body.label: Vellum Balloon
summary: Configures vellum balloon from geometry and adds to current vellum simulation.

body.name: dynamics_vellumgrains
body.label: Vellum Grains
summary: Configures Vellum grains from geometry and adds to current vellum simulation.

body.name: dynamics_rbdobjects
body.label: RBD Objects
summary: Creates one or more rigid bodies from SOP geometry.

body.name: dynamics_rbdheroobject
body.label: RBD Hero Object
summary: Creates an RBD Object from SOP Geometry.

body.name: dynamics_rbdglueobject
body.label: RBD Glued Objects
summary: Creates a number of rigid bodies from SOP geometry and glues them together.

body.name: dynamics_rbdpointobject
body.label: RBD Instanced Objects
summary: Creates a rigid body at each point of some source geometry, similarly to how the Copy SOP copies geometry onto points.

body.name: dynamics_rbdragdollobject
body.label: RBD Ragdolls
summary: Adds agent primitives to a Bullet simulation.

body.name: dynamics_rbdgrains
body.label: RBD Grains
summary: Fills an object with spheres and uses the Bullet solver to drive them.

body.name: dynamics_rbdconvexproxy
body.label: RBD Convex Proxy
summary: Creates a number of rigid bodies from SOP geometry, which use proxy geometry from a convex decomposition.

body.name: dynamics_rbdsphereproxy
body.label: RBD Sphere Proxy
summary: Creates a number of rigid bodies from SOP geometry, which use proxy geometry composed of adaptively-sized spheres.

body.name: dynamics_rbdfracturedobject
body.label: RBD Fractured Object
summary: Creates a number of RBD Objects from SOP Geometry. These individual RBD Objects are created from the geometry primitive groups.

body.name: dynamics_makebreakable
body.label: Make Breakable
summary: Automatically fractures an RBD object.

body.name: dynamics_impactanalysis
body.label: RBD Impacts
summary: Stores filtered information about impacts on an RBD object. The shelf tool has no effect in the viewport, it just sets up nodes in the network to record the impact data.

body.name: dynamics_debris
body.label: Debris
summary: Emits particles from the edges and surfaces of separating fractured rigid bodies.

body.name: dynamics_autofreeze
body.label: RBD Auto Freeze
summary: Automatically freezes RBD Objects that have come to rest.

body.name: dop_rbdpinconstraint
body.label: RBD Pin Constraint
summary: Constrains an object to a point in space using a pin-like connection.

body.name: dop_rbdconetwistconstraint
body.label: RBD Cone Twist Constraint
summary: Constrains an object to remain a certain distance from the constraint, and limits the object’s rotation.

body.name: dop_rbdsliderconstraint
body.label: RBD Slider Constraint
summary: Constrains an object to rotate and translate on a single axis, and limits the rotation and translation on that axis

body.name: dop_rbdhingeconstraint
body.label: RBD Hinge Constraint
summary: Constrains an object to a point in space using a hinge-like connection.

body.name: dop_rbdspringconstraint
body.label: RBD Spring Constraint
summary: Constrains an object to a point in space using a spring-like connection.

body.name: dop_rbdangularconstraint
body.label: RBD Angular Constraint
summary: Constrains the rotation an object so it does not rotate at all.

body.name: dop_rbdangularspringconstraint
body.label: RBD Angular Spring Constraint
summary: Constrains the rotation of an object so it attempts to rotate naturally, but bounces back to its original rotation.

body.name: dop_parentconstraint
body.label: RBD Parent Constraint
summary: Changes the parent of a constraint from a point in space to a goal object.

body.name: dynamics_makeflip
body.label: FLIP Fluid from Object
summary: Creates a FLIP Fluid Object from SOP Geometry.

body.name: dynamics_flipbox
body.label: FLIP Tank
summary: Generates node networks to create a half-filled box of FLIP fluid material, with proper boundary conditions to contain the fluid in the box.

body.name: dynamics_particlefluidemitter
body.label: Emit Particle Fluid
summary: Emits fluid into a FLIP simulation.

body.name: dynamics_makesink
body.label: Sink from Objects
summary: Absorbs smoke, fire, liquid, or particle fluid in a container.

body.name: dynamics_sculptedparticlefluid
body.label: Sculpted Particle Fluid
summary: Calculates and creates particle fluid between the surface and container of fluid in a particle fluid simulation.

body.name: dynamics_crownsplashfluid
body.label: Crown Splash Particle Fluid
summary: Creates a FLIP fluid simulation setup to create a crown splash.

body.name: dynamics_dripparticlefluid
body.label: Drip Particle Fluid
summary: Creates a FLIP fluid simulation setup to create a dripping fluid effect.

body.name: dynamics_suctionfluid
body.label: Suction Fluid
summary: Creates a suction force to guide particles fluids toward a target object.

body.name: dynamics_popcondensation
body.label: Condensation
summary: Creates a particle simulation to mimic condensation on geometry.

body.name: dynamics_makeviscous
body.label: Make Viscous
summary: Turns on the viscosity parameters of a FLIP Fluid.

body.name: dynamics_whitewater
body.label: Whitewater
summary: Creates spray, foam, and churn based on an underlying FLIP fluid simulation.

body.name: dynamics_slicebyplane
body.label: Slice
summary: Slices a particle fluid across an arbitrary plane for distribution to a simulation farm.

body.name: dynamics_slicealongline
body.label: Slice Along Line
summary: Slices a particle fluid using a set number of slicing planes evenly spaced along a certain direction.

body.name: dynamics_distribute_fluid
body.label: Distribute Particle Fluid
summary: Distribute shelf tools set up an object’s sim network so it can be solved in parallel on a farm of multiple machines using HQueue.

body.name: dynamics_meltobject
body.label: Melt Object
summary: Creates a melting object from geometry.

body.name: dynamics_objecttolava
body.label: Lava From Object
summary: Creates a lava object from geometry.

body.name: dynamics_emitlava
body.label: Emit Lava
summary: Generates a continuous stream of hot lava from an object.

body.name: dynamics_heatfromobject
body.label: Heat Within Object
summary: Turns an object into a source of heating when particles pass through.

body.name: dynamics_coolfromobject
body.label: Cool Within Object
summary: Turns an object into a source of cooling when particles pass through.

body.name: dynamics_emitsteamoncollision
body.label: Emit Steam On Collision
summary: Emits steam when a hot fluid comes into contact with a collider.

body.name: dynamics_makesink
body.label: Sink from Objects
summary: Absorbs smoke, fire, liquid, or particle fluid in a container.

body.name: dynamics_slicebyplane
body.label: Slice
summary: Slices a particle fluid across an arbitrary plane for distribution to a simulation farm.

body.name: dynamics_slicealongline
body.label: Slice Along Line
summary: Slices a particle fluid using a set number of slicing planes evenly spaced along a certain direction.

body.name: dynamics_distribute_fluid
body.label: Distribute Particle Fluid
summary: Distribute shelf tools set up an object’s sim network so it can be solved in parallel on a farm of multiple machines using HQueue.

body.name: geometry_smallocean
body.label: Small Ocean
summary: Creates a small patch of ocean complete with a material and depth information.

body.name: geometry_largeocean
body.label: Large Ocean
summary: Creates a large ocean complete with a material and depth information.

body.name: dynamics_guidedoceanlayer
body.label: Guided Ocean Layer
summary: Creates a FLIP fluid simulation that simulates a thin layer of the ocean surface.

body.name: dynamics_wavetank
body.label: Wave Tank
summary: Creates a FLIP fluid simulation from an underlying ocean surface.

body.name: dynamics_beachtank
body.label: Beach Tank
summary: Creates a FLIP fluid simulation of a beach with continuous waves.

body.name: dynamics_flattank
body.label: Flat Tank
summary: Creates a FLIP fluid simulation of a flat tank with a boundary layer.

body.name: dynamics_oceanflattank
body.label: Ocean Flat Tank
summary: Creates a FLIP fluid simulation from an underlying ocean surface.

body.name: dynamics_whitewater
body.label: Whitewater
summary: Creates spray, foam, and churn based on an underlying FLIP fluid simulation.

body.name: spyro_billowysmoke
body.label: Sparse Billowy Smoke
summary: Creates thick cloud-like smoke rising from a spherical base.

body.name: spyro_fireball
body.label: Sparse Fireball
summary: Creates a large rising and expanding explosion.

body.name: spyro_airexplosion
body.label: Aerial Explosion
summary: Creates an aerial explosion.

body.name: spyro_groundexplosion
body.label: Ground Explosion
summary: Creates a large ground explosion.

body.name: spyro_shockwave
body.label: Shockwave
summary: Creates a large rising and expanding explosion with a ground shockwave.

body.name: spyro_campfire
body.label: Bonfire
summary: Creates a bonfire simulation using the sparse pyro solver.

body.name: spyro_firespread
body.label: Spreading Fire
summary: Creates a fire simulation spreading across the surface of the selected object.

body.name: dynamics_femhybridobject
body.label: Hybrid Object
summary: Creates an FEM Hybrid Object from SOP Geometry.

body.name: dynamics_fracturedsolidobject
body.label: Fractured Solid Object
summary: Pre-fractures the geometry of the selected object, creates a solid finite element (FEM) object, and sets up the
attribute on the pieces so they will stick together.

body.name: dop_solidcollider
body.label: Surface Collider
summary: Create a Static Object from SOP Geometry pre-configured for interaction with cloth.

body.name: dop_volumecollider
body.label: Volume Collider
summary: Create a Static Object from SOP Geometry pre-configured for interaction with cloth.

body.name: dynamics_femtargetconstraint
body.label: Constrain Points to Target Animation
summary: Constrain a selection of points to animated target positions.

body.name: dynamics_femattachconstraint
body.label: Attach Points to Target Object
summary: Constrains regions within a FEM object to another FEM object.

body.name: dynamics_femslideconstraint
body.label: Slide Points against Target Object
summary: Constrains regions within a FEM object to another FEM object.

body.name: dynamics_femregionconstraint
body.label: Constrain Region
summary: Constrains regions within a FEM object to another FEM object.

body.name: dynamics_femfusepointpairs
body.label: Fuse Point Pairs
summary: Connect pairs of points in a simulation.

body.name: dynamics_visualizefiniteelements
body.label: Visualize Finite Elements
summary: Creates a finite-element visualization node.

body.name: dynamics_embedhighresobject
body.label: Embed Highres Object
summary: Lets you simulate a low-resolution solid object and apply the results to high-resolution geometry.

body.name: dop_wiresetinitialpose
body.label: Set Initial Pose
summary: Sets the initial shape of a simulated wire object based on its current shape.

body.name: dynamics_gluewiretoanimation
body.label: Glue Wire to Animation
summary: Constraints a wire point to a certain position and direction.

body.name: dop_wireattachmentconstraint
body.label: Attach Wire to Surface
summary: Creates soft body constraints between a set of points on a target object and the closest points on a goal object. This is useful for attaching wire to dynamics objects.

body.name: dop_wirepinconstraint
body.label: Wire Pin Constraint
summary: Provides controls for setting up basic positional constraints for wire objects.

body.name: dop_wirespringconstraint
body.label: Wire Spring Constraint
summary: Provides controls for setting up basic spring constraints for wire objects.

body.name: dop_wireangularconstraint
body.label: Wire Angular Constraint
summary: Constrains a wire point’s orientation to a certain direction.

body.name: dop_wireangularspringconstraint
body.label: Wire Angular Spring Constraint
summary:
Constrains a wire point’s orientation to a certain direction,
with a set amount of springiness.

body.name: dop_wireglueconstraint
body.label: Wire Glue Constraint
summary: Constraints a wire point to a certain position and direction.

body.name: dop_sbdattachconstraintrbd
body.label: Attach Constraint to Rigid Body
summary: Connects an existing soft body constraint to an RBD object.

body.name: dop_sbdattachconstraintpoint
body.label: Attach Constraint to Dynamics Point
summary: Connects an existing soft body constraint to a point on a dynamic object.

body.name: dop_sbdattachconstraintanimation
body.label: Attach Constraint to Animation
summary: Connects an existing soft body constraint to the object’s animation.

body.name: dop_sbddetachconstraint
body.label: Detach Constraint
summary: (Re)Connects an existing soft body constraint to a point in world space.

body.name: dop_sbddeleteconstraint
body.label: Delete Constraint
summary: Deletes an existing soft body constraint.

body.name: dynamics_distribute_wire
body.label: Distribute
summary: Distribute shelf tools set up an object’s sim network so it can be solved in parallel on a farm of multiple machines using HQueue.

body.name: object_crowdagent
body.label: Agent
summary: Creates an agent from a source character rig, FBX file, USD file, or LOP.

body.name: object_crowdaddclip
body.label: Add Clip
summary: Adds an animation clip to an agent primitive.

body.name: object_crowdcollisionlayer
body.label: Collision Layer
summary: Creates a new agent layer that is suitable for collision detection.

body.name: object_crowdconfigurejoints
body.label: Configure Joints
summary: Sets the rotation limits of an agent’s joints.

body.name: object_crowdpopulate
body.label: Populate
summary: Creates an agent source geometry node to generate agents for a crowd simulation.

body.name: object_crowdpaintdensity
body.label: Paint Density
summary: Allows you to paint areas of high and low crowd density on terrain to affect the random placement of agents.

body.name: object_crowdsolver
body.label: Simulate
summary: Sets up a crowd simulation network.

body.name: object_crowdterrain
body.label: Terrain Foot Planting
summary: Sets the selected geometry as the terrain for a crowd simulation.

body.name: object_crowdobstacle
body.label: Obstacle
summary: Sets the selected static DOP object as an obstacle for agents in a crowd simulation.

body.name: object_crowdpath
body.label: Path
summary: Sets agents in a crowd simulation to follow the selected curve.

body.name: object_crowdlookat
body.label: Look At
summary: Sets agents in a crowd simulation to look at the selected object.

body.name: object_crowdtargetposition
body.label: Target Position
summary: Guides agents towards a target position.

body.name: object_crowdagentcam
body.label: Agent Cam
summary: Creates and attaches cameras to crowd agents to visualize their point of view.

body.name: object_stadiumcrowdsexample
body.label: Stadium Example
summary: Creates an example stadium scene using the crowds tools.

body.name: object_streetcrowdsexample
body.label: Street Example
summary: Creates an example street scene using the crowds tools.

body.name: object_formationcrowdsexample
body.label: Formation Example
summary: Creates an example formation scene using the crowds tools.

body.name: object_fuzzyobstaclescrowdsexample
body.label: Fuzzy Obstacles Example
summary: Creates an example of using fuzzy logic for obstacle avoidance and path following.

body.name: object_fuzzytransitioncrowdsexample
body.label: Fuzzy Transition Example
summary: Creates an example of using fuzzy logic for state transitions.

body.name: object_ragdollrunexample
body.label: Ragdoll Run Example
summary: Creates an example of using ragdolls in a crowd simulation.

body.name: dynamics_makeactive
body.label: Activate Objects
summary: Turns on the dynamics on an object.

body.name: dynamics_makepassive
body.label: Deactivate Objects
summary: Turns off the dynamics on an object.

body.name: dynamics_removeobject
body.label: Remove Objects from Simulation
summary: Takes objects out of the simulation

body.name: dynamics_newsimulation
body.label: New Simulation
summary: Creates a new DOP Network.

body.name: dop_group
body.label: Group Dynamic Objects
summary: Creates simulation object groups.

body.name: dop_gravity
body.label: Gravity Force
summary: Applies a gravity-like force to objects.

body.name: dop_drag
body.label: Drag Force
summary: Applies force and torque to objects that resists their current direction of motion.

body.name: dop_uniformforce
body.label: Uniform Force
summary: Applies a uniform force and torque to objects.

body.name: dop_fan
body.label: Fan Force
summary: Applies forces on the objects as if a cone-shaped fan were acting on them.

body.name: dop_fluidforce
body.label: Fluid Force
summary: Applies forces to resist the current motion of soft body objects relative to a fluid.

body.name: dop_windforce
body.label: Wind Force
summary:
Applies forces to resist the current motion of objects relative to
a turbulent wind.

body.name: dop_magnetforce
body.label: Magnet Force
summary: Apply forces on objects using a force field defined by metaballs.

body.name: dop_vortexforce
body.label: Vortex Force
summary:
Applies a vortex-like force on objects, causing them to orbit about
an axis along a circular path.

title: Shelf tools
summary: How to use and customize the icons on the shelf at the top of the main window.
